contentrichtext.text: {{Unreferenced stub|auto=yes|date=December 2009}} {{Infobox City Japan |Name= Ikeda |JapaneseName= 池田町 |settlement_type= Town |MapImage= Ikeda in Nagano Prefecture Ja.svg |Region= [[Chūbu region|Chūbu]] |Prefecture= [[Nagano Prefecture|Nagano]] |District= [[Kitaazumi District, Nagano|Kitaazumi]] |ImageSkyline= |ImageCaption= |Area_km2= 40.18 |PopDate= 2003 |Population= 10,647 |Density_km2= auto |Coords= |LatitudeDegrees= 36 |LatitudeMinutes= 25 |LatitudeSeconds= |LongtitudeDegrees= 137 |LongtitudeMinutes= 52 |LongtitudeSeconds= |Tree= |Flower= |Bird= |SymbolImage= |SymbolDescription= |Mayor= |CityHallPostalCode= |CityHallAddress= |CityHallPhone= |CityHallLink= [http://www.ikedamachi.net/ Town of Ikeda] }} {{Nihongo|'''Ikeda'''|池田町|Ikeda-machi}} is a [[towns of Japan|town]] located in [[Kitaazumi District, Nagano|Kitaazumi District]], [[Nagano Prefecture|Nagano]], [[Japan]]. As of 2003, the town has an estimated [[population]] of 10,647 and a [[population density|density]] of 264.98 persons per km². The total area is 40.18 km². ==External links== {{Commons category-inline}} * [http://www.ikedamachi.net/ Ikeda official website] {{ja icon}} [[Category:Towns in Nagano Prefecture]] {{Nagano-geo-stub}}
